game.name: Diagram Awesome
game.genres: 디자인과 일러스트레이션, 사진 편집, 동영상 제작, 웹 퍼블리싱, 앞서 해보기
game.shortDescription: Create beautiful static or animated diagrams - perfect for Steam assets, fun presentations, or marketing materials. Use the built-in image generator or import your own images to bring your ideas to life.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Create beautiful static or animated diagrams - perfect for Steam assets, fun presentations, or marketing materials. Use the built-in image generator or import your own images to bring your ideas to life.
